extendedInfo.description: Gadgets and gizmos is a UK based technology application offering daily information on all things related to gadgets, gizmos and technology. The company is staffed by a team of dedicated writers who scour the globe for new and interesting stories to present on the site each day. We cover a range of topics including news and reviews of the latest smartphones, HDTVâs, gaming consoles, home gadgets, time saving gadgets and more.Key Features- Dedicated News Section- Easy to use navigation- View photo galleries, reviews and video on the app- Submit comments and share stories using your Facebook profile- Follow and share items via our built in Twitter feed- Ability to save favourite pages
